nodeList.loreText: A cunning mage can use the power of gravity in more ways than one
nodeList.nodeDescription: Call a meteor from the sky that deals a large amount of damage upon landing. Added damage is applied at three times its normal value.

nodeList.description: Meteor deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but Meteor has reduced cast speed.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [15%] more damage and [5%] less cast speed per point.

node.description: Meteor deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and even more against enemies at full health.
node.nodeDescription: [15%] more damage against enemies on full health per point

node.loreText: A cunning mage can use the power of gravity in more ways than one
node.nodeDescription: Call a meteor from the sky that deals a large amount of damage upon landing. Added damage is applied at three times its normal value.

nodeList.description: Meteor has increased cast speed, but costs more mana. Meteors fall faster.

node.description: Casting Meteor grants the {Craterborn} buff, granting increased fire damage and cast speed for a short duration. Craterborn does not stack.

nodeList.description:
After you cast Meteor you recover a portion of the mana spent over the next three seconds. 

You can only recover mana from one cast at once, so if you cast meteor again within three seconds you lose the remaining mana you would have recovered from the first cast.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [30%] increased area per point
